function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Smartwatch data collection and heuristic model used for disease detection","Impact":"Inaccurate detection may lead to undiagnosed cases and increased transmission","Mitigation":"Validation of model with clinical data and continuous improvement of algorithm","Technologies":"Smartwatch data analysis, heuristic modeling, machine learning","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, data scientists"},{"Description":"Application of AI in medical research and social context during pandemic","Impact":"Misuse of AI in decision-making may lead to ineffective response to the pandemic","Mitigation":"Ethical guidelines for AI use, transparency in AI decision-making, oversight by medical experts","Technologies":"AI, machine learning, data analytics","People":"Medical researchers, healthcare workers, policymakers","Owner":"Medical research institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Machine learning prediction of infection and severity risk for COVID-19","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions may lead to misallocation of resources and ineffective containment measures","Mitigation":"Validation of models with real-world data, continuous improvement of algorithms, integration of multiple data sources","Technologies":"Machine learning, data analytics, predictive modeling","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, public health officials","Owner":"Data scientists, public health agencies"}]}
